summary: this mod changes the attack and a few voices. i will try to adjust more things and update some new voices
descriptionHtml:
[size=15]
[color=#7D26CD]
Skyrim Erotic Voices
[youtube]JjUfF6Bu9GE[/youtube]
[/color][/size]
[size=5]
This mod is very similiar to 	
Elewin Erotic Combat Voice Replacer - Female Only 
[color=#157DEC][u]
HOWEVER!! I DID NOT USE ANY OF MODS OR FILES FROM ELEWIN
THIS IS NOT A REUPLOAD!
[/color][/u]
This mod allows the voice of the combat female to be changed to add sex sounds every time you hit. Very useful if your into like the S&M or werid skyrim stuff hahaha also included is running sounds and death. basically everything you could ever need for an erotic female voice. i will add more versions later :) i know i might need work on the voices being attacked.

Note* there is no sound when using archery. The gun in the video shows this. I like this how it is. 

[color=#7D26CD][u]How to use:[/u][/color]this mod can be used my NMM or manual. either way you can use them and it will overwrite the voice if you have any present or add the voice if those files are not present. If you remove the mod in NMM it still remembers and puts it back to how it was Note* PLEASE back up your SOUND folder file in Skyrim/DATA/Sound
Back it up in case you dont like the mod and want to change it back to normal.
I do not want to be responsible if you try to reinstall or uninstall and you have issues getting voices back although you really shouldnt have issues



[color=#7D26CD][u]How to turn voices back to normal/Uninstall:[/u][/color]
As i mentioned KEEP A BACKUP IN CASE. Overwrite the Sounds with the original backup you had before you used this mod if you are using the mod manually. Otherwise just uninstall normally in NMM. no plugins. Back ups are the best That way everything is safe and clean :)

[color=#7D26CD][u]Optional Files:[/u][/color]
18+ This optional file is pretty dirty and made just for fun. the timings are random and nothing that new. just for those looking for even more riskaayy stuff lmfao. also the new voices are on a mic.


[/size]
author: clandestinehp
